column4: Hello everyone. Can anyone assist me in mounting a raid partition (mdadm)? Everytime I try to mount /dev/md0 I get a 'Function not implemented' error message.
check your kernel for raid support
like you should also do, holycow
can grub boot a kernel only one time?
like for remote handling, if you get kernel panic
Just did the modprobe. Same error.
Using the edgy beta 'generic' A64 kernel.
then you are missing the raid module you need :) recompile your kernel with the needed module(s)
google for apt-get kernel-source + compile method
oh ugh... that's no fun. So the egdy generic a64 doesn't have raid0 in it.
